section_text: 1 The enactments referred to in Schedule 1 are repealed or revoked to the extent shown, subject to the savings contained in Schedule 2.

2 1 Any repeal or revocation made by this Act (and any saving in Schedule 2 which relates to it) extends to the part or parts of the United Kingdom to which the enactment being repealed or revoked extends. 2 Her Majesty may by Order in Council provide for any repeal or revocation made by this Act to extend, with or without modifications, to any of the Channel Islands, the Isle of Man or any British overseas territory.
3 1 This Act may be cited as the Statute Law (Repeals) Act 2013. 2 This Act comes into force on the day on which it is passed.
